p: Total ribonucleic acid (RNA) from ~ 100 mg SAT and VAT was isolated using Qiazol (Qiagen, Maryland, USA) and purified using the RNeasy Mini Kit (Qiagen Maryland, USA) according to the manufacturer’s instructions. RNA purity and quantity were analysed on the Nanodrop spectrophotometer (Nanodrop™ One, Thermo Fisher Scientific, Waltham, USA). Quality was measured by running RNA samples on the Agilent 2100 Bioanalyzer (Agilent Technologies).
